channel.title: HAIM on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in HAIM on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, October 2013
item.description: Four great albums this month for the last album digest in a while. CHVRCHES “The Bones Of What You Believe” I first got into CHVRCHES on Record Store Day, one of my purchases was an Irn Bru coloured 12" of the Recover EP that, according to eBay, tripled in value over night. Judging by this, their full debut, my see-through orange slab of happiness may hold its value, because it’s clear that CHVRCHES should be around for the long haul.
